alert.note: Alert for Eastern Black Range Foothills; Sierra County Lakes; Southern Gila Foothills, Mimbres Valley; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued June 09 at 3:03PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY ALERT IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM MDT FRIDAY... The New Mexico Departments of Health and Environment has issued an Air Quality Alert, from 6 PM this evening to 1 PM MDT Friday. * WHAT... Lighter and more variable transport winds in the vicinity of the Black fire will keep significant impacts from new smoke in close proximity to its perimeter through Friday morning. Considerable haze and light smoke aloft that contributed to moderate impacts farther north and east during the past 12 hours, particularly along and west the central mountain chain, will continue to disperse through the remainder of the afternoon. Transport winds broadly from the southwest or west through this evening will shift more from the northwest on Friday. New fires from lightning may also contribute to additional smoke to regional airsheds going into the day Friday as the weather trends hotter and drier. * WHERE... Smoke impacts will be most significant and widespread in Catron, northern Grant, western Sierra and western Socorro counties. This includes, but is not limited to, the following locations: Hillsboro, Kingston, San Lorenzo, Lake Roberts, Winston and the Gila Cliff Dwellings. Outflow winds from thunderstorm activity will further complicate smoke trajectories over and near the Gila National Forest, especially areas west and north of the fire. More details and latest air quality information can be found at https://fire.airnow.gov * WHEN... Remainder of this afternoon through at least 1pm MDT Friday, June 10th.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Black Range Foothills; Sierra County Lakes; Southern Gila Foothills, Mimbres Valley; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range
